import { Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Cart({ cartItems, SetcartItems }) { console.log(cartItems); return (

Your Cart: {cartItems.length}

{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.product.description}

${item.product.price}

- { if (item.product.stock <= item.qty) { return item.qty; } return cartItems((i)=>{ if(i.product._id === item.product._id){ i.qty++; } return i; }); }}>+
))}

Order Summary

Subtotal: 1 (Units)

Est. total: $245.67

); }
